definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: All patients recovered after operation except 1 case died of diabetes insipidus.
sentences.chinese: 絕大多數患者手術後恢復良好，僅1例死於尿崩症。

sentences.english: Is similar to the overwhelming majority thunderbolt, the network becomes the first disseminator .
sentences.chinese: 如同絕大多數突發事件，網絡成爲最先傳播者。

sentences.english: He thinks most people are " Phonies ", especially adults4.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲絕大多數人都是騙子，尤其是大人。

sentences.english: In the world of today, absolute majority countries have parties and exercise party politics.
sentences.chinese: 當今世界，絕大多數國家都存在政黨，實行政黨政治。

sentences.english: In the United States and most Western countries, however, most businesses are privately-owned.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在美國和絕大多數西方國家。

sentences.english: The great majority of earthquakes in this region occur beneath the northern portion of the embayment .
sentences.chinese: 這個地區的絕大多數地震都發生在該海灣北部的下面。

sentences.english: Most chromomeres contain a genetic unit.
sentences.chinese: 絕大多數染色粒包含一個遺傳單位。

sentences.english: In most of the fovea, the thickness increased.
sentences.chinese: 絕大多數中心凹厚度增加。

sentences.english: The vast majority of the world's most active volcanoes are within a few tens of kilometres of the coast (see map).
sentences.chinese: 世界上絕大多數活火山都在海岸線幾十公里範圍之內。

sentences.english: Of course, most signatures will only use a small portion of these methods.
sentences.chinese: 當然，絕大多數簽名僅使用這些方法中的一小部分。

sentences.english: At zero volts, most of the bacteria survived.
sentences.chinese: 當電壓是零伏特時，絕大多數細菌存活。

sentences.english: I think most people are quite serious about their studies.
sentences.chinese: 我想絕大多數人都非常重視他們的學業。

sentences.english: A smart car could eliminate most of these car accidents.
sentences.chinese: 智能汽車能消除絕大多數這類汽車事故。

sentences.english: But in the vast majority of cases, that formula remained impossibly hard to solve.
sentences.chinese: 但是在絕大多數情況下，這個公式都是無法求解的。

sentences.english: It’s easy, simple and the vast majority of nonprofits are approved.
sentences.chinese: 這些都很容易簡單，並且絕大多數已經得到認可。

sentences.english: This may explain the split personality of most Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 這也許可以解釋人格分裂的絕大多數中國人。

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
